Producer: Norman J. Grossfeld, Tomoyuki Igarashi, Takemoto Mori, Choji Yoshikawa
Production Co: Nintendo Co. Ltd., 4 Kids Entertainment, Shogakukan, Pikachu Project '99
Synopsis: Ash, Misty, Brock and Pikachu face Mewtwo, a bioengineered Pokémon, and the super-Pokémon it has created. With short "Pikachu's Vacation."
Title: Pokémon: The First Movie
